reviewText: This DVD of Rodeo Bloopers is not worth the time of Picture please, because this video has the poorest quality picture I have ever seen in a commercially produced product. The entire picture goes light and dark throughout the running. A poor choice, so don't waste your money, or time on this one. It was boring because of the dark and I would not recommend buying this DVD. Also, another second DVD is Rodeo Bloopers 10 - and rated it a 1 star because there as no zero star option. It was advertised as a great 'party video'. Advertising as a party video is a misrepresentation as I've not attended a party nor thrown a party for 30 min. in duration. Secondly, while I admit I enjoy the thrill of rodeo - an extremely dangerous sport, the events filmed in the video were failures, not bloopers. There were a couple of humorous events, but there was approx. 15 minutes of extremely boring 'acting' by some gentlemen trying to be funny - but they were ridiculous, so also, don't waste your money, or time on Rodeo Bloopers 10. Both of those two videos sucked so much, I had to throw both of them out in the recycle so I can say, "That's annoying" and both were boring and I would not recommend buying both of those two DVDs, they are yucky, dark and light changes, and both are silly crap of bull and there's team roping in Rodeo Bloopers 10, so, forget team roping and just stick with rodeo's only real three main events of calf roping steer wrestling and bull riding as the real true done deal, and let the cowgirls compete with the men in calf roping and bull riding as the real true done deal, got it? Save more of your time and money on mostly the real four products I recommend of: Rodeo Bloopers 8 - DVD Rodeo Bloopers 9 - DVD Rodeo Bloopers Collector's Edition 1 - DVD Rodeo Bloopers Collector's Edition 2 - DVD You'll love Rodeo Bloopers 8 - DVD,Rodeo Bloopers 9 - DVD,Rodeo Bloopers Collector's Edition 1 - DVD,Rodeo Bloopers Collector's Edition 2 - DVD because these are much better and I would totally recommend those four of the real Rodeo Bloopers as the real true done deal as four of them are all the real thing and a much better choice, so stick with and take my advice and pass on the other two and say those two never should've been made and should be history, so, just stick with Rodeo Bloopers 8 - DVD,Rodeo Bloopers 9 - DVD,Rodeo Bloopers Collector's Edition 1 - DVD,Rodeo Bloopers Collector's Edition 2 - DVD, got it and understood? Once again, this DVD of Rodeo Bloopers I wrote about is not a cinimatic masterpiece, but the only ones that kick into high gear that are a cinimatic masterpiece are just Rodeo Bloopers 8 - DVD,Rodeo Bloopers 9 - DVD,Rodeo Bloopers Collector's Edition 1 - DVD,Rodeo Bloopers Collector's Edition 2 - DVD, OK?
I couldn't get the DVD to 'PLAY'. It is not worth the time or shipping costs to return it the DVD. I threw it away.

Rodeo Bloopers is great. If you like seeing rednecks in clown costumes getting trampled by cattle, this is the dvd for you. Chocked full of dead hicks and full frontal bovine nudity Rodeo Bloopers is a cinimatic masterpiece.

This video has the poorest quality picture I have ever seen in a commercially produced product.  The entire picture goes light and dark throughout the running.  I even tryed my "video stabilizer" to  correct the problem.  There is no narration to enhance interest or explain  who or what, just western music.  A poor choice.
